$ pwd (Print Working Directory) $ ls -a (List dot files too) $ ls -l (Long format) $ ls -t (In Order) $ ls -alt (All options together) $ cp (copy file or dir) $ cp filetocopy destinyofcopy $ cp * folder (copy all file to destination) $ mv file destination (move file or folder) $ mv file.txt new_name.txt (Rename file) $ rm file.txt (remove file or folder) $ rm -r folder (options -r recursive delete)
